product_name: Canari Micro Pro Bike Shorts - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Thanks to smooth, six-panel construction and a padded chamois, the women's Canari Micro Pro bike shorts will quickly outpace your old shorts to become your new favorites for long days in the saddle. Nylon/Lycra(R) spandex blend wicks away sweat and dries quickly while offering excellent mobility. Six-panel construction creates an anatomic fit for excellent performance and comfort. Built-in seamless, molded chamois provides padded comfort and helps wick moisture away. Canari Micro Pro bike shorts feature gripper elastic at cuffs to keep shorts in place while riding. Special buy.
short_description: Thanks to smooth, six-panel construction and a padded chamois, the women's Canari Micro Pro bike shorts will quickly outpace your old shorts to become your new favorites for long days in the saddle.
